data.persona: I am but a peasant.  The king looks down on us.  I barely eat.  I wish I had a job.
data.description:
You are in the Bank.
This is a grassy area that surrounds much of the swamp.  It's a plain field with some trees nearby along with some rocks.
There's a field, a swamp, a rock, a tree, and a bush here.
The alligator and the swimmer are here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a shirt, and wielding a rock.

data.short_motivation: I want to eat the fish that are swimming in the swamp.
data.mid_motivation: I want to catch as many fish and possible to sell at the marketplace.
data.long_motivation: I want to make a lot of gold at the marketplace and live a better life.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: drink water from the swamp while watching the swimmer swim by.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield the rock against the alligator, knocking it unconscious. It is now safe to go in the water.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat fish after slow-cooking them over a fire.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: get more fish from the swamp to sell at the marketplace.
